# operationID

**Instance Property**

A unique identifier for a long-lived operation.

## Declaration

```swift
var operationID: CKOperation.ID { get }
```

## Discussion

Pass this property’s value to the [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKContainer/fetchLongLivedOperationWithID:completionHandler:] method to fetch the corresponding long-lived operation. For more information, see [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKOperation#Long-Lived-Operations].

## Identifying the Operation

- **CKOperation.ID**: A type that represents the ID of an operation.
